Introduction
This topic contains information on the effect of adverse determinations on the various classes of claimants or beneficiaries, including
determining the effect of the homicide of a Veteran
, and
effect of a homicide
of a beneficiary
, and
on entitlement to accrued amounts
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
